summary: A documentary on Phil Rosenthal's experiences during the making of "Voroniny," the Russian-language version of "Everybody Loves Raymond".
cast: Phil Rosenthal|Peter Boyle|Stanislav Duzhnikov|Eldar|Anna Frolovtseva|Boris Klyuev|Jeffrey Lerner|Artyom Loginov|Katya Marakulina|Shaban Muslimov|Konstantin Naumochkin|Marina Naumova|Doris Roberts|Ray Romano|Elena Starodubtseva|Oleg Tabakov|Aleksandr Zhigalkin
title: Exporting Raymond
